article.title: Stanley Incorporated Receives Contract to Support U.S. Army Intelligence and Security Command, Futures Directorate
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Stanley Incorporated has been awarded a five-year, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract with a $300 million ceiling by the U.S. Army Intelligence and Security Command (INSCOM), Futures Directorate. Stanley will provide technology, engineering and integration services to support INSCOM's worldwide intelligence operations.
